name: TheEricMetaxasShow
0:
”Alexa, play The Eric Metaxas Show”
”Alexa, ask The Eric Metaxas Show to play”
”Alexa, tell The Eric Metaxas Show to play”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the eric metaxas show
des: The Eric Metaxas Show offers compelling perspective on American culture, political life, and stories making news around the corner and across the globe. See metaxastalk.com for more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
